description: Cheese and Ham omelete in a crust.

directions.step: Thaw the sheet of puff pastry.
Chop the onion and saute it in the oil and some water until it starts to color.
Add the italian seasoning and let cool.
Roll the puff pastry sheet flat to line a 12" oven-proof ceramic dish.
Chop the ham and add it along with the cheese to the onion.
Transfer to the pastry lined dish.
Mix the eggs and cream in a small bowl, adding salt and pepper to taste.
Pour over the other ingredients and roll the edges of the pastry to create a nice border.
Put in the oven for 30-45 minutes or until the pastry is puffed and the filling has turned a nice golden color..
